**Proposal Description:**

The National Parks Agency seeks a contractor to replace the existing lookout and trails at Le Passage in Mauricie National Park, QC. The scope of work includes the removal of existing lookouts and trails, and the construction of new lookouts, paths, and landscaping, using materials primarily composed of granite.

**Submission Information**

*   Bidders are required to submit their proposals via email and / or fax.
*   Interested contractors must obtain the solicitation documents from [http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
*   An ITT (Invitation to Tender) will be provided to qualified bidders in a second stage, which will include a technical evaluation and a price evaluation component.
*   A bidder conference will be held on [05/08/2024 at 1:30 PM EDT] to review the scope of work.
*   The selected contractor will be required to perform and complete the work by [12/31/2025].
